biotools.summary: With this tool you can predict 1H, 13C, and 15N chemical shifts for your favourite protein using only its amino acid sequence as input. The technique uses dynamic programming to detect sequence homologies between your query and sequences of hundreds of previously assigned protiens in the BioMagResBank.

bioschemas.name: Shifty
